items.description: A few days late, but this is a advent calendar with 24 days of articles about JavaScript.

items.title: roughViz.js
items.description: A nice JavaScript library for creating sketchy/hand-drawn styled charts.

items.title: Curlie
items.description: Curlie is a command line HTTP client simliar to HTTPie, but with the features of curl.

items.title: Cell
